task_name: Create Initial Database Models for Scripts and Versions
resource_notes: Foundation for all repository work. Requires strong EF Core skills.
alternative_approach: Use a more junior developer with senior oversight, increasing hours by 30%.
risk_factors: Incorrect relationship mapping could cause significant rework later.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory peer review of the EF Core model by a senior developer.

resource_notes: Core implementation of the repository pattern for data abstraction.
risk_factors: Inefficient queries could lead to performance issues.
mitigation_strategy: Code review focused on query performance and transaction management.

resource_notes: Requires understanding of compliance requirements for audit logs.
alternative_approach: Use a third-party logging framework, but may not meet immutability needs.
risk_factors: Design may not meet SOC 2/ISO 27001 requirements if not reviewed.
mitigation_strategy: Early design review with a compliance expert (RISK-004).

task_name: Implement IEncryptionService using .NET Data Protection APIs
resource_notes: Security-critical component requiring expertise in DPAPI and key management.
alternative_approach: None, use of platform-provided APIs is a requirement.
risk_factors: Improper key management could lead to data being unrecoverable or insecure.
mitigation_strategy: Mandatory security code review by a second senior engineer.

task_name: Integrate Encryption Service into Script Repository
resource_notes: Requires transparent encryption/decryption within the data access layer.
alternative_approach: Use EF Core Value Converters for a cleaner implementation.
risk_factors: Performance overhead from encryption on every read/write.
mitigation_strategy: Benchmark repository methods before and after integration.

resource_notes: Minor enhancement to existing repository to support version history features.
mitigation_strategy: Standard code review and integration testing.

task_name: Design Audit Trail Storage for Immutability and Compliance
resource_notes: Requires specialized knowledge of compliance standards. Assigned to Security Architect.
alternative_approach: Outsource design to a compliance consultancy.
risk_factors: Design may be rejected by auditors if expertise is insufficient (RISK-004).
mitigation_strategy: Engage third-party compliance expert for mandatory design review before implementation.

task_name: Implement Compliant Audit Trail Storage and Retention
resource_notes: Implementation of the approved design. May require database-level permissions or write-only storage patterns.
alternative_approach: Use a managed service like AWS QLDB or Azure Confidential Ledger if possible.
risk_factors: Implementation may not fully realize the immutability goals of the design.
mitigation_strategy: Penetration testing focused on tampering with the audit log.

resource_notes: High-risk, one-time operation. Requires meticulous testing and validation.
alternative_approach: Manual migration for a small number of customers, but not scalable.
risk_factors: Legacy data quality issues could cause script failure during production cutover (RISK-003).
mitigation_strategy: Multiple dry-runs in staging; build a separate validation tool to compare outputs.

task_name: Integrate Audit Logging into Script Management Services
resource_notes: Straightforward integration of the audit service into existing CUD operations.
alternative_approach: Use MediatR pipelines or decorators to automate audit logging.
risk_factors: Forgetting to log an action could create a compliance gap.
mitigation_strategy: Create a checklist for all CUD operations and verify audit logging in E2E tests.
